file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 74-21-01-06 - IGNITERS - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL IGNITERS - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the inspection of the igniters. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 74-21-01-200-801-A IGNITERS - INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 74-21-01 Page 1 of 3 Rev 51 - Oct 31/16 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 74-21-01-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. IGNITERS - INSPECTION A. General (1) To do the detailed visual inspection of the igniters for wear, and corrosion, obey the instructions contained in Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 71-11-01-000-801-A/400 ENGINE UPPER COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 71-11-01-400-801-A/400 ENGINE UPPER COWLING - INSTALLATION Rolls-Royce MM CSP 34022 - C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 413 LH Engine Lower Cowling 423 RH Engine Lower Cowling 412 LH Engine Upper Cowling 422 RH Engine Upper Cowling D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Workstand To get access to the engine 1 available F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Engine I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, open the circuit breakers and attach a DO-NOT-CLOSE tag to them. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 74-21-01 Page 2 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL • START 1/2. (2) Remove the upper cowling (AMM TASK 71-11-01-000-801-A/400) to get access to the igniters. J. Inspect (Detailed Inspection) Igniters SUBTASK 220-002-A WARNING: THE IGNITION SYSTEM VOLTAGE IS DANGEROUSLY HIGH AND CAN KILL OR CAUSE INJURY TO PERSONS. MAKE SURE THAT THE IGNITION SYSTEM IS SET TO OFF FOR A MINIMUM OF SIX (6) MINUTES, BEFORE YOU START THE WORK ON THE IGNITION SYSTEM COMPONENTS. (1) Do a detailed visual inspection of the igniters. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls- Royce MM CSP 34022. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) On the circuit breaker panel, close the circuit breakers and remove the DO-NOT- CLOSE tag from them: • START 1/2. (2) Install the upper cowling (AMM TASK 71-11-01-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 74-21-01 Page 3 of 3 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
